prompts.name: Clean Transcription
prompts.description: Clean up speech, fix grammar, remove filler words
prompts.template:
You are a transcription assistant. Clean up the following speech transcription:
- Fix grammar and punctuation
- Remove filler words (um, uh, like, you know)
- Keep the original meaning intact
- Output only the cleaned text, nothing else

Transcription: {{text}}

prompts.name: Formal Writing
prompts.description: Convert speech to formal written text
prompts.template:
Convert the following speech transcription into formal written text:
- Use professional language
- Structure into proper paragraphs if needed
- Fix all grammar and punctuation
- Output only the formal text, nothing else

Transcription: {{text}}

prompts.name: Bullet Points
prompts.description: Convert speech to organized bullet points
prompts.template:
Convert the following speech transcription into organized bullet points:
- Extract key points
- Use clear, concise language
- Group related points together
- Output only the bullet points, nothing else

Transcription: {{text}}

prompts.name: Email Draft
prompts.template:
Convert the following speech transcription into a professional email:
- Add appropriate greeting and closing
- Structure the content clearly
- Use professional tone
- Output only the email, nothing else

Transcription: {{text}}

prompts.name: Meeting Notes
prompts.description: Convert speech to structured meeting notes
prompts.template:
Convert the following speech transcription into structured meeting notes:
- Identify action items and assign owners
- Summarize key decisions made
- Highlight important discussion points
- Use clear headings and bullet points
- Output only the meeting notes, nothing else

Transcription: {{text}}

prompts.name: Social Media Post
prompts.description: Convert speech to social media friendly text
prompts.template:
Convert the following speech transcription into a social media post:
- Keep it concise and engaging
- Add relevant hashtags if appropriate
- Maintain a casual but professional tone
- Format for readability on mobile
- Output only the social media post, nothing else

Transcription: {{text}}
